question.text:
'Chinese gift stirs up drama' (title)
What does this title refer to?
A Stratford locals dislike the plans for the construction of a pavilion connected to a Chinese play.
B The inhabitants fear that Stratford will be flooded with Chinese fans of Shakespeare.
c The Stratford population feels offended by the comparison of a Chinese play to Romeo and Juliet.
D The towns of Stratford and Fuzhou disagree about the construction of a pavilion.
